recommendations.title: Add Meta Description
recommendations.description: Your page is missing a meta description. Add a compelling 150-160 character description that includes your primary keywords and encourages users to click.
recommendations.impact: High impact on click-through rates from search results

recommendations.title: Expand Page Content
recommendations.description: With only 17 words, your page has extremely thin content. Search engines prefer comprehensive content. Aim for at least 300-500 words of valuable, relevant content.
recommendations.impact: Critical for ranking - thin content rarely ranks well

recommendations.title: Add Canonical URL
recommendations.description: Add a canonical tag to specify the preferred version of this page and prevent duplicate content issues.
recommendations.impact: Prevents SEO dilution from duplicate content

recommendations.title: Improve Title Tag
recommendations.description: Your title is only 14 characters. Expand it to 50-60 characters with relevant keywords and a compelling message.
recommendations.impact: Better titles improve CTR and rankings

recommendations.title: Add Structured Data
recommendations.description: Implement JSON-LD structured data (Organization, WebPage schema) to help search engines understand your content and potentially earn rich snippets.
recommendations.impact: Can improve visibility in search results

recommendations.title: Target Long-Tail Keywords
recommendations.description: Create content targeting long-tail keywords like 'how to use example domain for testing' to capture more specific search traffic.
recommendations.impact: Long-tail keywords often have higher conversion rates

recommendations.title: Build Quality Backlinks
recommendations.description: Develop a link building strategy: create linkable assets, guest post on relevant blogs, and submit to web directories.
recommendations.impact: Backlinks are a major ranking factor

recommendations.title: Add XML Sitemap
recommendations.description: Create and submit an XML sitemap to help search engines discover and index all your pages efficiently.
